question: Which country to host the 6th edition of World Government Summit (WGS)?
explanation: The sixth edition of the World Government Summit (WHS) is scheduled to be held from February 11th - 13th, 2018 in Dubai, UAE. India will be the guest of honour in this summit. The summit is the largest movement to review and share the best experiences, and the first global forum for governments, countries, organizations and private sector leaders interested in the industry of the future. At its 5th session in February 2017, the World Summit of Governments attracted more than 4,000 participants from 139 countries and 150 speakers attended 114 sessions.
